page.title: 06VISIT TO I.C.I.
page.content: We went to visit ICI.When we got there we met the the site manager Mr Robinson.He took us round.First he talked about Winston Churchill who in 1912 came to the Stanleys wedding.Then we went to the lake.When ICI first came the lake was divided into two sections. ICI turned it into one lake. In the lake there were Canada geese. Coots and Martins. For the people who volunteer themselves to try the drugs they built an office and games room. Since they try the drugs they have to stay there for up to a week. They built the office over the water. They made a dam drained the water and laid concrete posts and put the office on top. We then came out and went into another entrance. We went to the sports club. They have lots of sports facilites like Tennis Squash. Football and lots more.
